body.name: SHVYOG Vitamin C Peel Off Face Mask, Peel Off Mask with Turmeric, Blackhead Remover & Deep Cleansing Face Peel Mask, Vitamin C Exfoliating Face Mask for Blackheads, Large Pores, Dirts, Oil
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 4 mins
features: 【DEEP CLEANSING PEEL OFF MASK】 - SHVYOG Vitamin C peel off face mask helps to draw out the deep seated dirt and impurities trapped in the skin pores. It helps to unclog pores, remove the dead skin cells, peel off blackheads, whiteheads, remove skin oil and environmental toxins on face, resurface and smooth skin’s texture to provide a more radiant, smoother and youthful appearance.

【ANTI AGING & BRIGHTENING】- Vitamin C has the ability to promote skin cell growth and repair. It’s a powerful antioxidant for anti-aging, restore the youthful texture and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. VC face peel mask helps lighten skin dullness and detoxify the skin, exfoliate, and brighten tired, over-stressed skin without stripping away natural moisture. Helps restore natural complexion and tone of the skin.

【SAFE & NATURAL INGREDIENTS】 - This turmeric exfoliating face mask infused with vitamin c, which helps cleansing and promote brightening skin. The anti-inflammatory properties of turmeric help reduce skin redness and acne. Enriched with calendula and chamomile to effectively plump and shine your skin. Our vitamin c peel mask is gentle and non-irritating to peel off skin impurities, suitable for all types of skin.

【EASY TO USE】- After cleansing, apply a thin layer vitamin c face mask and leave it for 30-35 minutes until your face feel a little bit tight, then gently peel mask off start from the bottom of the mask. Avoid application to the hairline, eyebrows, or eyelashes. Wipe off any residue with a hot towel and follow with toner, serum or moisturizer.

【PERFECT AFTER SALES】- We will do our best to meet your needs. If you are not satisfied with our vitamin c skin care peel off mask for any reason, we will solve it for you as soon as possible, please feel free to contact us. We aim to provide you with a perfect online shopping experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SHVYOG VITAMIN C PEEL OFF MASK WITH TURMERIC FOR SKIN CARE Vitamin C Peel Off Face Mask has many benefits. Our Turmeric Face Mask helps to detoxify the skin,deep cleansing, remove surface impurities and keep your skin hydrated. And it is rich in vitamin c, which has high antioxidant levels and anti-aging properties. Suitable for all skin types and can be used with confidence.

THE KEY INGREDIENTS EFFECTIVE IN PROMOTING BRIGHTENING SKIN Vitamin C has the ability to stimulate skin cell growth and repair, helps improve facial complexion, and has remarkable antioxidant power. The anti-inflammatory properties of turmeric help reduce redness caused by acne. Our vitamin c brightening face mask is gentle and non-irritating to peel off skin impurities, suitable for all types of skin.

POWERFUL FACE MASK PEEL OFF HELPS PURIFY AND GLOW YOUTHFUL SKIN DEEP CLEANSING . Helps drawing out impurities, skin oil and environmental toxins BLACKHEADS REMOVER . Helps remove stubborn blackheads, whiteheads, dead skin on face MOISTURIZING & BRIGHTENING . Smooths your skin texture and maintain skin moisture and oil balance SAFE & NATURAL . With natural plant ingredients, no irritation, no harm, safe to the skin

DEEP CLEANSING VITAMIN C PEEL FACE MASK FOR YOU This premium quality blackhead remover mask helps to unclogged blocked pores and treats pimples, blackheads, whiteheads, excessive oiliness and acne, it will deep cleansing the impurities on the surface skin and help create firmer, healthier, more balanced skin for radiant confidence. It even helps regulate skin imbalances in the body.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just got mine today used it right away .. okay for people saying it hurts taking this mask off , it doesn’t hurt at all taking this mask off , this mask is easy to take off , I notice when I took it off ,my face looked brighter and felt baby soft with the first time use !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite peel-off mask
reviews.reviewText: This peel-off mask seems very deep-cleaning and is slowly brightening my complexion. I use it once or twice a week. The only minus is that it doesn't want to peel off in one piece. It has a tendency to shred around the nose, which then requires extra effort to completely remove. I'll purchase again, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was really pleased with this mask. It’s definitely sticky and can sorta hurt if applied on sensitive areas around the face. A little goes a Iong way! I accidentally applied too much and spread it to my neck without much thought. That was a mistake! It was a bit painful pulling it off, I ended up simply washing it off with a damp cloth. Apply on the face and stay in the T-zone area and you’ll be fine. My face felt so clean, smooth and refreshed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It arrived quickly but it's pretty heavy on the Turmeric so the scent is slightly sweet and a bit odd. Overall, it works okay I guess. Not great, but not horrible either. Just sort of meh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love this set !
reviews.reviewText: I'm now in my 30s, so I'm trying to be a little kinder to my skin. Burned it a few months ago and was left with some nice new sun spots. While it's still too early to tell if it will help fade them, my face feels AMAZING after the mask and the serum. I do not, however, like the little spatula. It's too much trouble, I just use my hands. It does kind of hurt when you peel it off, but no more than that black charcoal peel off mask. I do feel it's a little more difficult to apply than other masks I've used, It's a slightly thicker consistency. I've been trying to find a new night cream, and the serum has been working amazingly for my sensitive skin. No redness, itch, or irritation! Just a nice fresh face. I'm also in Arizona, so my skin is constantly dry. But since I've been using this product, I wake up to a nicely moisturized face. I had looked at many different products before I purchased this, and I'm super happy I went with this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT GET THIS
reviews.reviewText: This mask seems great but it is very messy. Why must it have came in a pot and not a squeeze bottle? Unless you put a good layer on, it does not peel. And then unless you are going to lay down SECONDS after you put it on, it'll start dripping off your face; I had it on now for 10 minutes and it's still dripping It is very hard to clean up, I needed to use dish soap. I've had it on for close to an hour now I barely any of it is dry, it wouldn't peel so I had to use dish soap ON MY FACE to try and get the wet spots off. This whole thing took probably 2 whole hours. NEVER AGAIN

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Peel off!
reviews.reviewText: I like that it was an easy painless peel off and it left my skin feeling super soft with a nice glow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Bad for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I put the smallest bit on my face and I had a huge red spot on my face. It doesn’t smell good and has a wierd texture.
Macht die Gesichtshaut reinUnd ist gut weg zu machenVielen Dank
Efficace, toutefois mettre une épaisseur correcte pour faciliter le décollement...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to apply and great results
reviews.reviewText: This isn’t the best if you have sensitive skin as peeling is off can be uncomfortable. However the result are fantastic, my skin was brighter and softer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: It really does what it said! The peel of is quiet strong, exactly what i was looking for! And the oil after is just amazing!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Im großen und ganzen gute Maske
reviews.reviewText: Leider kam die Maske etwas ausgelaufen an, ließ sich aber sehr gut auftragen mit dem Spachtel der dazu geliefert wurde, Geruch war auch okay, dauert leider etwas länger bis sie trocken ist. Abziehen war nicht schmerzhaft und die Haut fühlt sich danach angenehm an.
